name: Name
deleteActConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
removeUserConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove {{ user }}
makeOrgAdminConfirmation: Are you sure you want to make {{ user }} an org admin?
makeSiteAdminConfirmation: Are you sure you want to make {{ user }} a site admin?
newSampleAdded: Your new sample has been added!
qrPrintInstructions: Print and paste this QR code on the sample to be analyzed
fileNotUploadedErrors: File not uploaded because we noticed errors in the spreadsheet. Please download the sheet to see the errors and reupload.
originValueError: origin value should be one of the following: known, uncertain, or unknown
errorCreatingAccount: There was an error creating your account.
passwordsDontMatch: The passwords you entered don't match.
incorrectLogin: The username or password entered is incorrect.
emailAlreadyInUse: There is already an account with this email.
weakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters long.
legendP1: Point: The distance from the center of the tree sample cross-section where the sample was taken. 0% is the center, 100% is the bark, 50% halfway between the center and the bark.
legendP2: δ13C wood: The ratio of carbon-13 isotopes in the wood relative to a standard carbon sample, parts per 1000.
legendP3: δ13C cel: The ratio of carbon-13 isotopes in the sample's cellulose relative to a standard carbon sample, parts per 1000.
legendP4: δ18O wood: The ratio of oxygen-18 isotopes in the wood relative to a standard oxygen sample, parts per 1000.
legendP5: δ18O cel: The ratio of oxygen-18 isotopes in the sample's cellulose relative to a standard oxygen sample, parts per 1000.
legendP6: d15N wood: The ratio of nitrogen-15 isotopes in the wood relative to a standard nitrogen sample, parts per 1000.
percentageOfWaterIn1kmBufferZone: Percentage of water in a 1km buffer zone
percentageOfWaterIn10kmBufferZone: Percentage of water in a 10km buffer zone
landUseSourceFooterP2: i) Water coverage for the inputted lat-long, and within a 1km and 1km radial buffer zone around the point, and
landUseSourceFooterP3: ii) Land usage data from remote sensing broken down into Anthropic (definition), Primary Vegetation (definition) and Secondary Vegetation (definition)
nearbyDeforestationAlertsSource: Deforestation alerts are provided by <1>MapBiomas Alerta<1>
orgNameExists: An organization with that name already exists
